item.title: 在IOS中像SnapChat一样监控screenshots
item.description: A number of Stack Overflowquestions were having issues with this, so I figured I’d explain. From reverse engineering, this is the exact method used by SnapChat, but it’s also pretty much what I’d have done myself. The process is pretty simple, and relies on a quirk of iOS: taking a screenshot cancels all touches on the screen. Because of that, anything that you

item.title: IOS7截屏问题
item.description: iOS 7截图最新变化: 不再影响用户其他操作 在 iOS 7 中，截图动作已经发生了变化，就如苹果在版本说明中描述的那样：用户截图时，有效点击不会再失效了。这
